options.content:
#

Key metrics ( Metrics Reference ) which needs to be monitored during a server activity, like 1. Restart, 2. Software upgrade, 3. Investigation etc., Data is shown as stats, error and resources, resource utilization is displayed for the TopK major consumers at a service and namespace level

panels.title: PI Query - Long, Short, Aggr, UDF (rate)
SI Query - Long, Short, Aggr, UDF (rate)

targets.expr:
(aerospike_latencies_write_ms_bucket{cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^", le="+Inf"})
- ignoring (le)
(aerospike_latencies_write_ms_bucket{cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^", le="$latency_time_bucket"})

panels.title: Duplicate Resolutions - Ask, Respond, No Read (rate)

list.description: node or service in a cluster
list.label: Node
list.name: node
